meanings.definition: A digestive enzyme that breaks down proteins in the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: Chymotrypsin helps our bodies digest food in the small intestine.
meanings.sent2: The doctor mentioned the importance of chymotrypsin in breaking down proteins.
meanings.sent3: When chymotrypsin goes to a party, it always helps break down the snacks!
meanings.sent4: The action of chymotrypsin on proteins is like a pair of scissors cutting through paper.
meanings.sent5: Imagine chymotrypsin as a tiny protein ninja slicing through its targets.

meanings.definition: An enzyme produced by the pancreas.
meanings.sent1: The pancreas releases chymotrypsin to aid in digestion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the production of chymotrypsin in the pancreas.
meanings.sent3: The pancreas was so proud of its chymotrypsin production, it did a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Chymotrypsin from the pancreas is like a helpful friend breaking down proteins.
meanings.sent5: The chymotrypsin factory in the pancreas works tirelessly to keep us healthy.

meanings.definition: A protease enzyme that cleaves peptide bonds in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Proteins fear the power of chymotrypsin breaking their bonds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the precise action of chymotrypsin on peptide bonds.
meanings.sent3: Chymotrypsin and peptide bonds had a race, but chymotrypsin always won!
meanings.sent4: The role of chymotrypsin in cleaving peptide bonds is like a key unlocking a door.
meanings.sent5: In the world of proteins, chymotrypsin is the legendary bond breaker.
